mapper.insert: insert into c_customer( id, owner, name, companyWebsite, companyExtension, createBy, createTime, contactMinute, nextContactTime, description ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{companyWebsite}, #{companyExtension}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{contactMinute}, #{nextContactTime}, #{description} )
mapper.select:
select
c.id, c.name, u.name as owner, c.companyExtension, c.companyWebsite
from c_customer c join c_user u on c.owner = u.id
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and c.companyExtension like concat('%', #{companyExtension}, '%')
and c.companyWebsite like concat('%', #{companyWebsite}, '%')
order by c.createTime desc
limit #{skipCount}, #{pageSize}

select count(*)
from c_customer c join c_user u on c.owner = u.id
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and c.companyExtension like concat('%', #{companyExtension}, '%')
and c.companyWebsite like concat('%', #{companyWebsite}, '%')

select
c.id, u.name as owner, c.name, c.companyWebsite, c.companyExtension, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.contactMinute, c.nextContactTime, c.description, c.detailAddress
from c_customer c join c_user u on c.owner = u.id
where c.id = #{id}
